column1: Ten months out of the year. But this time of year we help Santa!  Here he is!
This is Santa's flight control center. From here, we can monitor Santa from satellite as he travels the globe delivering presents.
Sleigh is hit! I repeat! Sleigh is hit!
Sleigh is going down! I repeat! Sleigh is going down!
We got a red sleigh down. We got a red sleigh down.  Red Sleigh 2, this is North Pole.  Red Sleigh 1, this is North Pole.  Mr. Kringle?
